website_summaries.verdict: An affordable option for those who are looking for a no-frills hair dryer holder.
pros: Suits hair dryers of all sizes
cons: Some have complained about the quality of the mounting screws

customer_reviews.title: Thats done
customer_reviews.text: Received mount in New condition. Mount seems very well made. The finish is very nice, and well applied. The mount was easy to attach to the wall, the supplied anchors were not three greatest and I ended up using my own. The mount holds the blow dryer very well. I would recommend this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: TY

customer_reviews.title: One design flaw solved, and the wife is happy.
customer_reviews.text: Needs a cushioned button, on the round surface where it mounts, like I added, to stop it from scratching the dryer every time it's removed and put back. Throw away the plastics anchors, mount it to a stud, if possible, as the plastic anchors just aren't going to hold over time.
customer_reviews.author: T. Graham

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to install.
customer_reviews.text: There were no directions for installation. The diagram that is shown with the photos is incorrect. It shows the metal anchor piece (circle/disc) with the dome side facing out. It is supposed to be installed with the concave side facing out like this: wall here: I anchor plate here: ( . This way the little screw on the actual hanger can hold it in place. The little hex wrench that came with it was difficult to work with as I could only turn it 1/8 at a time, very tedious. I'm not sure it will last. It seems a bit wobbly. The metal finish is very nice looking though. 'hoping for the best.
customer_reviews.author: mellowpanda

customer_reviews.title: Solid and stylish
customer_reviews.text: It's exactly as advertised. It's solidly made and the wall mount is rigid and secure. What could have been improved was to include actual instructions in the box. I don't know if someone at the factory/warehouse of origin forgot but the only thing in the box was the item and mounting screws. I had to look at the product page on Amazon to see the pictorial directions. This should not have been the case. Notwithstanding, installation was a cinch as I had the proper tools at my disposal. I wish they made a nickel finish holder. This would have matched the fixtures in my bathroom better.
customer_reviews.author: Scott E. MacFarlane

customer_reviews.title: Nice. Could be better, but worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Nice wall hook. Hold dryer well. The curved end is also handy to hand flat iron on if the appliance has one of the small circular hole, which many do. It is lightweight. The color is ok, looks slightly cheap and not as rich as I would've liked but also didn't pay too much. Overall, useful and handy. The only downside is that it doesn't really hold cords well; ended up just throwing them over the backside near the wall mount to keep stuff off the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Holbrook

customer_reviews.title: Beware of No Return
customer_reviews.text: This product is made okay, However I misjudge the length on my hair dryer cord to where I wanted to place this item. I tried to return but seller DOES NOT allow returns. So make sure this is exactly what you are looking for or you will have wasted your money and added another useless item to your garage....
customer_reviews.author: valerie h.

customer_reviews.title: Feels sturdy when mounted (we managed to get one screw into ...
customer_reviews.text: This dryer holder was quick and simple to install. Comes with all the needed mounting hardware and holds the dryer without issue. Feels sturdy when mounted (we managed to get one screw into a wall stud). We are pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Wraith7n

customer_reviews.title: Thank you
customer_reviews.text: I got tired of my wife leaving her blow dryer and cord across the floor. So I decided to purchase this holster and it works great. Easy install and now I don't have to worry about tripping over it in the morning on my way out the room.
customer_reviews.author: jamie hunter

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, Attractive Item!
customer_reviews.text: It's a sturdy quality product. It keeps my daughter's hair dryer secure and out of the way. Some instructions would have been nice, but since my IQ is rather high, I figured it out! ;-)
customer_reviews.author: Ty Seale

customer_reviews.title: Own two of them.  Solves problem of how to store a hair dryer.
customer_reviews.text: Mounting instructions require a hole be drilled into your drywall. But that is not really necessary. I just hang mine, and thereby avoid damaging anything. It does solve the problem of how to store a hair dryer, when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Apoiuwerhpga

customer_reviews.title: Screw would not hold
customer_reviews.text: The small screw that you put on last would not hold up the hair dyer holder. I attempted for over an hour, even solicited help (as I thought it was me) and they were also unable to get it to hold. Now I have two holes in my wall and in the process of returning the holder. Let's just say you seem to be getting what you pay for. PS: It would help to have simple instructions added to make sure you are doing it correctly, even though lack of instructions was not my issue.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great for straighteners
customer_reviews.text: Works great for straighteners. I use it while I am heating up with no problems. I love the cord holding attachment! Great buy and easy to clean if you are like me and have hairspray all over the place. - Samantha R
customer_reviews.author: Trent

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 2 months
customer_reviews.text: This did not work as it supposed to. The spring came apart after using it with hair drier for about 2 months.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonPrimePACustomer

customer_reviews.title: Buy It!
customer_reviews.text: Not too much to say, but it holds my hair dryer really well. I have one that has kind of a long barrel and it goes all the way in. It's of good quality, and I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Pink

customer_reviews.title: Great little holder
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little holder for my hair dryer. Very compact and the dryer fits in perfectly. I have it installed under the counter so that the cord is out of sight. I like the little hook at the end that holds the plug end so I don't have to search for it. Nice design.
customer_reviews.author: Numberwriter

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for a week
customer_reviews.text: It worked great for a week but the hanger keeps coming off of the bracket. I really wished it was more durable.
customer_reviews.author: Max M.

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, best to install in stud not drywall
customer_reviews.text: Recommend to install into stud. We are using the anchors that came with the package, but with the weight of the hair dryer the holder still pulls off the wall slightly.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah O

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: The mount was missing one of the screws for installing. It appeared as though someone had sent the box back and taken one of the screws as there was a piece of the bag open. That being said it holds my hair dryer perfectly although it wasn't designed to hold your dryer if it has an attachment attached. If you use a defuser or other attachment it will have to be removed
customer_reviews.author: Janon

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Love this for organizing the blow dried. Works well and have had it up for months!
customer_reviews.author: TW

customer_reviews.title: this thing sucks
customer_reviews.text: its like a hollow, crappy aluminum? Maybe tinfoil? Coming apart after install and now the dryer is drooping towards the wall. Kinda a pain to install too.
customer_reviews.author: Peter John

customer_reviews.title: Works great for a straightener as well!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my straightener because I don’t have much bathroom counter space and it’s perfect! I didn’t even realize it had a holder for the plug so that’s a bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Marissa

customer_reviews.title: A review for the sake of it.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is cool. It works. You have to tighten the holding screw down pretty tightly though. otherwise the weight of the hair dryer can cause it to rotate a bit. I accidentally ordered two, so I make them battle each other.
customer_reviews.author: Antone Enger

customer_reviews.title: It's a good price and works as described
customer_reviews.text: It's a good price and works as described. Wish it was sturdier/heavier weight metal. Definitely need to buy your own wall mount/screws rather than using the cheapo ones that come with it. I like the finish and how it works.
customer_reviews.author: Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, good size, wish material and finishes is nicer
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had got one sooner
customer_reviews.text: This works perfect to get my hairdryer up and out of the way but still readily accessible. Wish I had got one sooner. I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Received defective product, seller sent replacement. Works perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: Originally received a defective one. The hole in the spiral was made in the wrong spot so the spiral hung downward rather than straight out. Contacted seller and they immediately sent me a replacement that is not defective. It works exactly as intended and seems sturdy enough.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous?

customer_reviews.title: The spring is great, but the attachment screws were cheap and stripped ...
customer_reviews.text: The spring is great, but the attachment screws were cheap and stripped before I could install. I recmoment using your own screws to install.
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: Looks good
customer_reviews.text: Good holder but the quality a little bit light than I thought let’s see for the future
customer_reviews.author: Eric zhang

customer_reviews.title: Should have looked a little closer at the pictures, ...
customer_reviews.text: Should have looked a little closer at the pictures, this has a very light colored frosted metal finish. It does not match any brushed nickel or brushed stainless elsewhere in the bathroom. Otherwise looks functional but I won't bother mounting this.
customer_reviews.author: M. Blanton

customer_reviews.title: Average product
customer_reviews.text: The thing to keep holder on the wall falls out sometimes
customer_reviews.author: vinh

customer_reviews.title: looks and works great
customer_reviews.text: I love having my hair dryer off the counter using this. It holds my dryer nicely and looks nice too. I even hook my curling iron on to the end. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: needy and nice
customer_reviews.text: I really love this holder,it is exactly what I need.

customer_reviews.title: A great buy
customer_reviews.text: A nice wall mount for hair dryer. A MUST BUT FOR BATHROOM
customer_reviews.author: Denny

customer_reviews.title: Works great, better instructions would be helpful
customer_reviews.text: It works great. I like the little loop for the cord. Instructions should be included in the package, but they are online on Amazon in the product photo section.
customer_reviews.author: Willow

customer_reviews.title: Stay away from  This
customer_reviews.text: Poorly made . Bent when my blow dry was inserted

customer_reviews.title: Wrong size screws
customer_reviews.text: The screws it came with don't fit in the back??? I'm not happy that I'm not able to install it as easy as everyone said.
customer_reviews.author: beth manhardt

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: This wall mount works fine, no problem getting my dryer to fit. I mounted it on the inside of the cupboard door so it would be out of the way. The instructions left a lot to be desired, however.
customer_reviews.author: J. Miller

customer_reviews.title: I don't know if this is a supplier issue, ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if this is a supplier issue, but the plate is not bent correctly to hold the little hex screw that secures the holder in place.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Buettner

customer_reviews.title: Worth buying!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Oh! This is possibly the best purchase I’ve made in awhile. Keeps the counter clean & clear of clutter. Money well spent!!!

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This was just what I needed to get my blow dryer out of the way and off the countertop. Works great!

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: It works! I was mostly sceptical of my handyness, but it seems pretty darn sturdy!

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last!
customer_reviews.text: We hung this item on our bathroom wall according to directions and with furnished supplies. It broke off within a couple of weeks of use. Would not recommend.

customer_reviews.title: The hair dryer holder is very practical.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the holder for my hair dryer. I hate clutter, and now that I have a holder for my hair dryer it's one less item under my sink.

customer_reviews.title: Easy intallation, strong construction.
customer_reviews.text: Love this little hair dryer holder. Easy to install, no longer have too drag out my dryer, plug it in and then back in the drawer till tomorrow.

customer_reviews.title: sleek
customer_reviews.text: Unexpected delight. Cleaned up my bathroom counters with sleek and convenient design. Easy to install.

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Works great for organizing my wife's area in the bathroom

customer_reviews.title: Saw something like this in a cabin on a cruise I was ...
customer_reviews.text: Saw something like this in a cabin on a cruise I was on. Thought of it during a recent bathroom renovation. It was exactly what I wanted. Quick wall mount, as advertised, works great.

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Worked well with my Conair 1875 hair dryer. I used a single screw in sheetrock anchor to hold it.

customer_reviews.title: Great invention!
customer_reviews.text: Looks sleek and works perfectly, it's a veritable spiral holster for my hair dryer that I have been looking around a hook for 2 years. I highly recommend this product.

customer_reviews.title: but this is a very cool item. It is simple
customer_reviews.text: I'm not big on writing reviews, but this is a very cool item. It is simple, elegant and easy to install. Works great for our bathroom.

customer_reviews.text: Size and shape are perfect, and it looks great in my bathroom. I wish it came in more colors...I ended up painting mine gold to match the rest of the bathroom.

customer_reviews.title: Holds up nice and looks good on the wall
customer_reviews.text: Holds up nice and looks good on the wall. I attached it to a wall stud to help avoid ripping the drywall anchors out with how much use it gets. Overall a good product.

customer_reviews.title: Really great product
customer_reviews.text: I really like the hair dryer holder. Streamlines clutter in the bathroom and allows for easy access to the dryer. Very nice product.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very convenient and keeps my hair dryer out of my way and from falling off the cabinet

customer_reviews.title: The wall mount works great for my hair dryer
customer_reviews.text: The wall mount works great for my hair dryer! Price us great and it looks good. The only trouble I had with it initially was that the locking screw did not keep the position very well. I was able to fix the angle by turning the screw really tight but u was wondering if that was the way it was designed.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick F.

customer_reviews.title: Hairdryer holder for the wall.
customer_reviews.text: Very attractive and neat ,except the aperture was too narrow to accommodate the funnel on the end of the dryer. Had to get someone to bend and widen it to fit. Now it is fine.

customer_reviews.title: bad description
customer_reviews.text: There is no cord hook the picture should be changed to reflect actual product and description!

customer_reviews.title: Nice, simple, sturdy holder
customer_reviews.text: Liked the materials & look of the holder, very attractive & sturdy. However, no installation instructions are provided. Figured it out (installs like a towel rod) and am very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: GardenGal

customer_reviews.title: Product was just what I was looking for, my ...
customer_reviews.text: Product was just what I was looking for, my hair dryer is out of the way and not sitting on the bathroom counter.

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy. Arrived on time, with all parts. Didn’t realize the spiral piece “tips”. But it looks nice and does the job.

customer_reviews.title: Hair Dryer Wall Mount
customer_reviews.text: Great item for getting hair dryer off the counter and cord off the floor. Easy to install. Came with anchors and screws.

customer_reviews.title: a simple little picture would have been a big help and would have made this a quick and easy installation.
customer_reviews.text: I would have given 5 stars but for,one important thing. Simple instructions Would have been a big help. The plate mounted on the wall was tucked inside the base face down. Thanks to no directions, I ended up 45 minutes later and a hole to patch before I figured out the small round metal piece needed to be hollow side up. Just saying, a simple little picture would have been a big help and would have made this a quick and easy installation.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Garrison

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Looks great with my bath decor. Very convenient.

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts can't even install
customer_reviews.text: Didn't come with a small flat head screw so I could attach the actual spring to the flat piece that screws into the wall. I'm pretty handy and have a full tool set but none are the right size to get this custom piece out. GARBAGE WASTE OF MONEY

customer_reviews.text: there is no spot on the mount for the cord, as indicated in the picture

customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this. There were many to choose from and glad I selected this one.

customer_reviews.text: Arrived promptly, well made and looks great. Works well in my small bathroom.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Received two days ago and so far I definitely approve of it.
customer_reviews.author: Lou D.

customer_reviews.title: it really needs to be coated in silicone or rubberized or something like that.
customer_reviews.text: This does hold my hair dryer, so it does meet that expectation. However... the metal coil is definitely scratching up the barrel of my hair dryer something awful. It's just a hair dryer, so it doesn't matter much, but... it really needs to be coated in silicone or rubberized or something like that.
customer_reviews.author: M Noreen

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Not made well. Don't buy. There isn't any place to screw into the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Geneva

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I found it very flimsy and made of cheap materials
customer_reviews.author: Paul Rivera Jr

customer_reviews.title: Poor Design
customer_reviews.text: Unit broke after two days. The spiral twisted and came out of the base. I can see that the plunger from the base did not engage the hole at the end of the spiral coil and that allowed the spiral to twist. Not good. Also, there was not an allen wrench to set the base on the bracket and the set screw for the allen wrench was round and not octagonal for a normal allen wrench. I had to use my pocket knife to tighten. Not good.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great place to buy.
customer_reviews.text: The dryer holder came in very quick, faster than what I expected. It is a well made holder and easy to install. It came with everything you need (great nail holder as well). Prior to buy from this place, I also bought the same holder from a different place for my second bathroom but it came weeks later. They are the same quality. The only thing I don't like is the bottom corner of the holder. I really think it's a little bit sharp but no big deal. It is still a valuable and my favorite buy.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Overall great. But use different mounting hardware.
customer_reviews.text: Overall I really like this item. My only issue is that the mounting hardware that comes with it (namely the little plastic anchors) is not very good and would not allow it to mount and remain stable. It was wobbly when I used the original mounting hardware. But I used some metal self-drilling wall anchors and the screws that came with them, and I was able to mount it solidly. It no longer wobbles. The little screw on the side is a bit annoying to tighten with the allen key against the wall, but it’s doable.
customer_reviews.author: Harish

product_meta.title: Aluminum Wall Mount Spring Style Hair Dryer Holder Rack Hair Drier Storage Organizer, Hair Blower Holder with Plug Hook
product_meta.description: It is made of high quality aluminum space material, which does not rust and fade.
feature_bullets: The rack is for small and portable hair dryer
Durable and exquisite, high temperature resistance
It is made of high quality aluminum space material, which does not rust and fade
Saving space and keep dryer in order, suitable for bathroom and washroom
Dimension: 4.5" x 3.75" x 5". Please kindly check through the illustration about installing steps
